description:
In this course, explore a powerful round-trip workflow between Avid Media
Composer and Pro Tools to quickly mix dialogue, sound effects, and music for
film. Author Scott Hirsch frames the lessons in a way that appeals to
filmmakers of all levels, as well as professional and amateur audio mixers. He
starts with exporting your tracks from Media Composer and taking advantage of
the film and video-specific templates in Pro Tools, which makes project setup
a snap. Then discover how to consolidate and edit dialog, fix noise problems
and background hum, and add special effects. Finally, explore how to use
automation and EQ to enhance and marry your final tracks to the picture.
title: Mixing a Short Film with Pro Tools
